applymethod.argument: -id "$value(r_object_id)" -delimiter ";" -if "training_required = 1" -target_table "dm_dbo.bio_lms_data_table" -attr "document_id;chronicle_id;category;site;from_state;to_state;object_name;title;doc_language;service_status;approved_date;rec_creation_date;rec_last_updated_on;domain_id" -values "$value(r_object_id);$value(i_chronicle_id);$value(category);$repeatingvalue(applicable_sites);$value(a_status);Effective;$value(object_name);$value(title);$value(document_language);1;$value(approved_date);date(now);date(now);$value(bio_domain_id)" -url_prefix "https://bldmsdev.biocon.com/D2" -url_attr "url" -ver "true" -ver_label "IMPLICITE" -ver_attr "version_label"

applymethod.argument: -if "i_chronicle_id IN (select i_chronicle_id from cd_controlled_doc (all) where r_object_id in (select document_id from cd_issued_print where a_status = 'Printed' and document_id in (select r_object_id from cd_controlled_doc (all) where a_status='Superseded' and r_object_id <> '$value(r_object_id)' and i_chronicle_id = (select i_chronicle_id from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)'))))" -type "dm_document" -object_name "Previous Versions of document '$value(object_name)' with Unreconciled Issued Prints" -acl "System Admin Report" -folder "/Temp" -report_query "select object_name, requestor, r_creation_date as date_created, reconciliation_due_date from cd_issued_print where document_id IN (select r_object_id from cd_controlled_doc (all) where a_status='Superseded' and r_object_id <> '$value(r_object_id)' and i_chronicle_id = (select i_chronicle_id from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)'))" -report_style "/System/CDF/Report Stylesheets/Default Report Stylesheet" -report_title "Previous versions with unreconciled Issued Prints" -report_text "The following Issued Prints are on an older version of the document and have not been reconciled" -mail_config "Issued Prints on older versions" -set_attrs "keywords=$LIST(applicable_sites,cd_issued_print_~lower(~item)_reconcilers,',')"
applymethod.name: CDFCreateObjectMethod

applymethod.argument: -if "domain ='GMP' or domain='Med Device'" -id $value(r_object_id) -query "select alias_value as authors from d2_dictionary_value v,d2_dictionary d where v.dictionary_name = d.object_name and d.object_name = 'GMP Applicable Sites' and v.object_name in (select applicable_sites from cd_quality_gmp_approved where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)') and d.alias_name = 'authors' and v.i_position = d.i_position and any alias_value is not nullstring order by alias_value ENABLE (ROW_BASED)" -all_rows true -truncate true
applymethod.name: CDFUpdateAttrsViaQueryMethod

applymethod.name: CDFUpdateAttrsViaQueryMethod

applymethod.name: CDFUpdateAttrsViaQueryMethod

applymethod.argument: -if "domain ='GMP' or domain='Med Device'" -id $value(r_object_id) -query "select alias_value as doc_coordinators from d2_dictionary_value v,d2_dictionary d where v.dictionary_name = d.object_name and d.object_name = 'GMP Applicable Sites' and v.object_name in (select applicable_sites from cd_quality_gmp_approved where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)') and d.alias_name = 'doc_coordinators' and v.i_position = d.i_position and any alias_value is not nullstring order by alias_value ENABLE (ROW_BASED)" -all_rows true -truncate true -apply_d2_configs true
applymethod.name: CDFUpdateAttrsViaQueryMethod

applymethod.argument: -if "domain ='GMP' or domain='Med Device'" -id $value(r_object_id) -query "select alias_value as notification_list from d2_dictionary_value v,d2_dictionary d where v.dictionary_name = d.object_name and d.object_name = 'GMP Applicable Sites' and v.object_name in (select applicable_sites from cd_quality_gmp_approved where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)') and d.alias_name = 'doc_coordinators' and v.i_position = d.i_position and any alias_value is not nullstring order by alias_value ENABLE (ROW_BASED)" -all_rows true -truncate true -apply_d2_configs true

callmethod.argument: -child_objects DIRECT -if_child "a_status != 'Reclassified'" -validate_child "r_object_type in ($lookup('$value(r_object_type)','Object Type Mapping','Reclassification Object Types'));a_status in ($lookup('$value(r_object_type)','Object Type Mapping','Reclassification Document States'));r_lock_owner = ' ';r_immutable_flag = false;category = $value(category)" -invalid_child_message "invalid object type: @value(r_object_type);invalid lifecyle state: @value(a_status);checked out to user @value(r_lock_owner);not the latest (current) version;invalid lifecycle category (@value(category)) - not a category $value(category) document" -validation_result_attr subject -run_as_server true -context_user "$USER"
callmethod.message_failed_en: The virtual document ''$value(object_name)'' has documents that cannot be reclassified.
callmethod.name: CDFVirtualDocumentMethod

applymethod.argument: -commit false -if_child "a_status != 'Reclassified'" -validate_child "r_object_type in ($lookup('$value(r_object_type)','Object Type Mapping','Reclassification Object Types'));a_status in ($lookup('$value(r_object_type)','Object Type Mapping','Reclassification Document States'));r_lock_owner = ' ';r_immutable_flag = false;category = $value(category)" -invalid_child_message "invalid object type: @value(r_object_type);invalid lifecyle state: @value(a_status);checked out to user @value(r_lock_owner);not the latest (current) version;invalid lifecycle category (@value(category)) - not a category $value(category) document" -record_parent_vdoc_id_in_child_attr reclassify_vdoc_object_id -transform_artifacts $value(transform_artifacts) -auto_inherit_config "$value(auto_inherit_config_rule)" -ignore_null_values $value(ignore_null_values) -child_state_transition "Reclassified" -vdoc_success_state_transition "For Rec-Approval" -vdoc_error_state_transition "Draft" -generate_report true -log_progress_in_attr log_entry -notify_on_success false -notify_on_error true -send_mail true -context_user "$USER"
applymethod.name: CDFReclassifyArtifactsAsyncMethod

applymethod.argument: -id $value(r_object_id) -query "select w.object_name as wf_workflow_name from dm_workflow w, dmi_package p where w.r_object_id = p.r_workflow_id and any p.r_component_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and w.r_runtime_state =1 order by r_start_date desc" -ignore_null_values true -override true
applymethod.name: CDFUpdateAttrsViaQueryMethod

applymethod.name: CDFZipVirtualDocumentAsyncMethod
